cat_item.display_value: Copy of Ansible Tower Onboarding Request

catalog_script_client.name: Populate Org Name & Description

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_c0214f4fdbce68101407c7ec0b9619c7
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Copy of Ansible Tower Onboarding Request">b311874fdbce68101407c7ec0b96193a</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:d7bcd066dbca20101407c7ec0b96192d</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Populate Org Name & Description</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   var business_service = g_form.getReference('corresponding_business_service',update_form);
}

function update_form(business_service){
   // alert('Setting ORG values!');
   var application_code = business_service.u_cmdb_ci_service_application_code;
   g_form.setValue('organisation_name',application_code);
   g_form.setReadOnly('organisation_name', true);
   var name = business_service.name;
   g_form.setValue('organisation_description',name);
   g_form.setReadOnly('organisation_description', true);
   g_form.setValue('organisation_admins','SSC-AWX-ALL-ORGADMIN-' + application_code );
   g_form.setReadOnly('organisation_admins', true);
   g_form.setValue('organisation_members','SSC-AWX-ALL-ORG-' + application_code );
   g_form.setReadOnly('organisation_members', true);
   sessionStorage.setItem("org_name", ""+g_form.getValue('organisation_name'));
   g_form.setVisible('request_type', false);	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>e663988</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-02-05 11:11:53</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c0214f4fdbce68101407c7ec0b9619c7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Populate Org Name & Description</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="GTS_OAR_Ansible_Tower" source="x_ibmss_gts_oar_at">0cf0becddb143300c66571198c961991</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="GTS_OAR_Ansible_Tower">0cf0becddb143300c66571198c961991</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_c0214f4fdbce68101407c7ec0b9619c7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>e663988</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-02-05 11:11:53</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
